Purifying Salt

The Pokémon's salt protects it from statuses and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.

Level-Up

The following Pokémon can equip this ability after reaching a certain level.
# Pokémon Type Level
118 Dhelmise
100
297 Dwebble
54
298 Crustle
54
